item.text: Just then a prophet arrived from Judah with the Lord’s message for Bethel, as Jeroboam was standing near the altar ready to offer a sacrifice.

He cried out against the altar with the Lord’s message, “O altar, altar! This is what the Lord has said, ‘Look, a son named Josiah will be born to the Davidic dynasty. He will sacrifice on you the priests of the high places who offer sacrifices on you. Human bones will be burned on you.’”
That day he had also given a sign, saying, “This is the sign that the Lord has declared: The altar will split open and the ashes on it will pour out.”

<st data-num="01961" class="">When</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> the <st data-num="0376 0430">prophet’s</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">message</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> he had <st data-num="07121" class="">cried out</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> in <st data-num="01008" class="">Bethel</st>, <st data-num="03379" class="">Jeroboam</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">took</st> his <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">and pointed</st> it<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="08610" class="">Seize</st> him!” Then the <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> he had <st data-num="07971" class="">pointed</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> him <st data-num="03001" class="">stiffened up</st>,<n id="2" /> and he <st data-num="03201" class="">could</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07725 0413">pull</st> it <st data-num="07725 0413">back</st>.
Meanwhile the altar split open, and the ashes poured from the altar in fulfillment of the sign the prophet had given with the Lord’s message.

The king responded to the prophet, “Seek the favor of the Lord your God and pray for me, so that my hand may be restored.” So the prophet sought the Lord’s favor and the king’s hand was restored as it was at first.

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> then <st data-num="01696" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0376 0430">prophet</st>, “<st data-num="0935" class="">Come</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">home</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> me and <st data-num="05582" class="">have something to eat,</st> so that I may <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> you a <st data-num="04991" class="">gift</st>.”<n id="1" />

But the <st data-num="0376 0430">prophet</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, “<st data-num="0518" class="">Even if</st> you were to <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> me <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st> your <st data-num="01004" class="">possessions</st>,<n id="1" /> I would <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you. I am <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> allowed to <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> in <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st>.
For this is how I was commanded in the Lord’s message, ‘Eat no food. Drink no water. And do not return by the way you came.’”
So he started back on another road; he did not travel back on the same road he had taken to Bethel.

Now there was an old prophet living in Bethel. When his sons came home, they told him everything the prophet had done in Bethel that day. And they told their father all the words that he had spoken to the king.

Their <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="01696 0413">asked</st> them, “<st data-num="0335 02088">Which</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">road</st> did he <st data-num="01980" class="">take</st>?” His <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">showed</st> him<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="01870 0834">road</st> the <st data-num="0376 0430">prophet</st> from <st data-num="0834 0935 03063">Judah</st> had <st data-num="01980" class="">taken</st>.

He then <st data-num="0559 0413">told</st> his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, “<st data-num="02280" class="">Saddle</st> the <st data-num="02543" class="">donkey</st> for me.” When they had <st data-num="02280" class="">saddled</st> the <st data-num="02543" class="">donkey</st> for him, he <st data-num="07392 05921">mounted</st> it

and <st data-num="01980" class="">took off</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="0376 0430">prophet</st>, whom he <st data-num="04672" class="">found</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> an <st data-num="0424" class="">oak tree</st>. He <st data-num="0559 0413">asked</st> him, “Are <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="0376 0430">prophet</st> from <st data-num="0834 0935 03063">Judah</st>?” He <st data-num="0559" class="">answered</st>, “Yes, <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> am.”

He then <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="01980" class="">Come</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">home</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> me and <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="03899" class="">something</st>.”

But he <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “I <st data-num="03808 03201">can’t</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">go back</st> <st data-num="0854 0935 0854">with</st> you.<n id="1" /> I am <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> allowed to <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> to <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you in <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st>.
For an order came to me in the Lord’s message, ‘Eat no food. Drink no water there. And do not return by the way you came.’”

Then the old prophet said, “I too am a prophet like you. And an angel has told me in a message from the Lord, ‘Bring him back with you to your house so he can eat food and drink water.’” But he had lied to him.
So the prophet went back with him. He ate food in his house and he drank water.
While they were sitting at the table, the Lord’s message came to the old prophet who had brought him back.
So he cried out to the prophet who had come from Judah, “This is what the Lord has said, ‘You have rebelled against the Lord’s instruction and have not obeyed the command the Lord your God gave you.
You went back. You ate food. And you drank water in the place of which he had said to you, “Eat no food. Drink no water.” Therefore your corpse will not be buried in your ancestral tomb.’”
So this is what happened after he had eaten food and drunk water. The old prophet saddled the donkey for the prophet whom he had brought back.

So the prophet from Judah travelled on. Then a lion attacked him on the road and killed him.

There was his body lying on the road, with the donkey standing next to it, and the lion just standing there by the body.

<st data-num="02009" class="">Then</st> some <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> came <st data-num="05674" class="">passing by</st> and <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="05038" class="">body</st> <st data-num="07993" class="">lying</st> in the <st data-num="01870" class="">road</st> with the <st data-num="0738" class="">lion</st> <st data-num="05975" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="0681" class="">next</st> to the <st data-num="05038" class="">body</st>. They <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> and <st data-num="01696" class="">reported</st> what they had seen<n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> the <st data-num="02205" class="">old</st> <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">lived</st>.

When the old prophet who had invited him to his house heard the news, he said, “It is the prophet who rebelled against the Lord. The Lord delivered him over to the lion and it tore him up and killed him, in keeping with the Lord’s message that he had spoken to him.”

He <st data-num="01696 0413 0559">told</st> his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, “<st data-num="02280" class="">Saddle</st> my <st data-num="02543" class="">donkey</st>.” So they <st data-num="02280" class="">saddled</st> it.

He <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> and <st data-num="04672" class="">found</st> the <st data-num="05038" class="">body</st> <st data-num="07993" class="">lying</st> in the <st data-num="01870" class="">road</st> with the <st data-num="02543" class="">donkey</st> and the <st data-num="0738" class="">lion</st> <st data-num="05975" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="0681" class="">beside</st> <st data-num="05038" class="">it</st>;<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0738" class="">lion</st> had <st data-num="03808" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eaten</st> the <st data-num="05038" class="">body</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="07665" class="">attacked</st> the <st data-num="02543" class="">donkey</st>.

The old <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05375">picked up</st> the <st data-num="0376 0430">prophet’s</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05038" class="">body</st>, <st data-num="03240" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02543" class="">donkey</st>, and <st data-num="07725" class="">brought</st> it <st data-num="07725" class="">back</st>. The <st data-num="02205" class="">old</st> <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st> then <st data-num="0935 0413">entered</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> to <st data-num="05594" class="">mourn</st> him and to <st data-num="06912" class="">bury</st> him.

He <st data-num="03240" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="05038" class="">body</st> into his own <st data-num="06913" class="">tomb</st>, and they<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05594" class="">mourned</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> him, saying, “<st data-num="01945" class="">Ah</st>, my <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>!”

<st data-num="01961 0310">After</st> he <st data-num="06912" class="">buried</st> him, he <st data-num="0559 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, “When I <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>, <st data-num="06912" class="">bury</st> me in the <st data-num="06913" class="">tomb</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> the <st data-num="0376 0430">prophet</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="06912" class="">buried</st>; <st data-num="03240" class="">put</st> my <st data-num="06106" class="">bones</st> <st data-num="0681" class="">right beside</st> his <st data-num="06106" class="">bones</st>,
because the message that he announced as the Lord’s message against the altar in Bethel and against all the temples on the high places in the cities of the north will certainly be fulfilled.”
After this happened, Jeroboam still did not change his evil ways; he continued to appoint common people as priests at the high places. Anyone who wanted the job he consecrated as a priest.
This sin caused Jeroboam’s dynasty to come to an end and to be destroyed from the face of the earth.
